com.serialpundit.serial.internal

Class SerialComDBReleaseJNIBridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.serialpundit.serial.internal.SerialComDBReleaseJNIBridge

  • public final class SerialComDBReleaseJNIBridge
extends java.lang.Object

    This class is an interface between java and native shared library. The native library is found in the root of 'sp-tty.jar' file.

    Author:
    Rishi Gupta

    • Method Detail

      • loadNativeLibrary

        public static boolean loadNativeLibrary(java.lang.String directoryPath,
                        java.lang.String loadedLibName,
                        com.serialpundit.core.SerialComSystemProperty serialComSystemProperty,
                        int osType,
                        int cpuArch,
                        int abiType)
                                 throws com.serialpundit.core.SerialComException

        Extract native library from jar in a working directory, load and link it. The native library is found in the root of 'sp-tty.jar' file.

        Parameters:
        directoryPath - null for default directory or user supplied directory path.
        loadedLibName - null for default name or user supplied name of loaded library.
        serialComSystemProperty - instance of SerialComSystemProperty to get required java properties.
        cpuArch - architecture of CPU this library is running on.
        osType - operating system this library is running on.
        abiType - binary application interface type to correctly link.
        Returns:
        true on success.
        Throws:
        com.serialpundit.core.SerialComException - if java system properties can not be accessed or required files can not be accessed, if shared library is not found, it can not be loaded, linked and initialized etc.
